channel.title: I would like to open up Cocoa's Suggestion [AGAIN]
channel.description:
[center][size=40pt]I AM POSTING THIS ON BEHALF OF COCOA'S OLD POST![/size] [b]A Quote from Cocoa[/b]
Configuration Board/Code Bin I am proposing a new board. The Server configuration section/Code bin where we could post little snippets of code that people may find useful such as a void we just made, Full character screen, commands, full autospawn, all item bonuses etc. I hope to get support and especially to get this board added. [size=50pt]POST IF YOU SUPPORT[/size] Supporters: GalkonsPride satesql tonypker13 The Soul Beast43 SkillersDream Tabbykiller The Reaper X si force ry60003333 Jordiescape i alec i chassy13 JaydenD12 `Worx lesterknome Jeremy368 xjadefighter x blitz x firewithin3 kalrender Xile Maizez tajkillerscape drask182 bonzakid jupesku delicious joeyjoe9876 heroisgay syzygy p0sesed s0ul Jeff1234 Doom32dd cloudscape RuneRemix oceano1 1337 owns z_diddy_reloaded bigbugg warlock 999 i own u bro Darkness Pk glabay Xx R A G 3 R rune-pure lool121 Thrasher Alpha i0wnuall benscape john5689 Gnarly... joeyjoe9876 demonnd jc22493
This is a QUOTE FROM COCOA'S POST. But I do have to say the Fourms are getting a bit messy with all the new 500+ that are comming. I guess all of the people inside that Quote are still Supporting Cocoa's Topic? I am hopeing a Moderator will approve this along the way if not Please Remove...[/center]

item.title: I would like to open up Cocoa's Suggestion [AGAIN]
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

As Si Force said, a pastebin is good enough. A snippets board will not be created anytime soon.

Read full topic

There is not much of a need for a board, a thread and the pastebin would suffice.[/quote]

[center][size=40pt]I AM POSTING THIS ON BEHALF OF COCOA’S OLD POST![/size]

A Quote from Cocoa

Configuration Board/Code Bin I am proposing a new board. The Server configuration section/Code bin where we could post little snippets of code that people may find useful such as a void we just made, Full character screen, commands, full autospawn, all item bonuses etc.

I hope to get support and especially to get this board added.
